page.title: 05GROWING RAPE IN MID ESSEX
page.content: This is a fairly new and successful crop.It is sown in August by direct drill.It flowers in Spring making the fields bright yellow.It is cut just before it is ripe,about 6 weeks after blossoming and left to ripen on the ground for 2 weeks.Then it is dried and stored in silos.The crushers pay a better price if the farmers hang on to their crop because they cannot deal with all the harvest at once.This far- mer sells his crop in January. {Good profits}are made from rape espec- ially if the weather is favourable.In 1984 it was ideal,a dry Autumn,a wet Spring,and a dry Summer made a bumper crop.To be profitable,it must give at least 20cwt an acre.The 1983 crop gave 23cwt,1984 30 cwt.In Jan'85 the price was Â£285 a ton,in Jan'84 it was Â£325. The lower price was balanced by a bet- ter crop.Rape is used as cooking oil.
